name: Polvora
tagline: Creative people, driven by practical results
description:
We are creative and online. We work for brands that want to really communicate with their audience, and not just establish a presence.
Founded in July 2008, Polvora! Is an advertising agency specializing in online communication and social media.
Creativity moves us. We unite creativity, content, media, technology, activation actions and even offline media to make brands communicate with and delight your audience.
